pageSubtitle: Apne investment knowledge ko test karein aur fraud se bachna seekhein
expertiseTitle: Aapka investment expertise level kya hai?

beginner.name: Beginner
beginner.description: Investment mein naye hain, basics seekh rahe hain

intermediate.name: Intermediate
intermediate.description: Thoda experience hai, main concepts samajhte hain

advanced.name: Advanced
advanced.description: Experienced investor, market ki gehri jaankari

recommendations.excellent: Excellent! Aapko strong investment knowledge hai. Options trading ya international markets jaise advanced topics par vichar karein.
recommendations.good: Acchi foundation! Portfolio diversification aur risk management strategies par focus karein.
recommendations.basic: Basic samajh. Fundamental analysis aur alag-alag investment vehicles ka study karein.
recommendations.beginner: Beginner level. Compound interest aur alag-alag asset classes jaise basic concepts se shuru karein.

fraudAwareness.good: Acchi awareness hai, lekin savdhan rahein!
fraudAwareness.poor: Kripya fraud protection ke baare mein aur dhyan se padhein.

1.question: Agar koi guaranteed high returns ka vaada kare to aapko kya karna chahiye?
options: Miss na karne ke liye turant invest karein
Shak karein aur acchi tarah se research karein
Agar woh professional lagein to un par bharosa karein
1.explanation: Guaranteed high returns ek bada red flag hai. Legitimate investments mein risk hota hai aur koi bhi returns ki guarantee nahi de sakta.

2.question: Inmein se kaun sa ek common fraud tactic hai?
options: Jaldi invest karne ke liye urgency create karna
2.explanation: Urgency create karna victims par jaldi decisions lene ke liye pressure daalne ka ek classic fraud tactic hai.

3.question: Investment opportunity ko verify karne ka sabse accha tarika kya hai?
options: Salesperson ki baat par bharosa karein
Scheme mein doosre investors se poochein
3.explanation: Hamesha SEBI, RBI, ya doosre relevant bodies jaise regulatory authorities se verify karein.

4.question: Investing mein diversification kya hai?
options: Saara paisa ek stock mein lagana
Investments ko alag-alag assets mein failana
Saara paisa savings account mein rakhna
4.explanation: Diversification alag-alag assets, sectors, aur geographies mein investments ko faila kar risk kam karta hai.

5.question: P/E ratio ka kya matlab hai?
5.explanation: P/E ratio ek company ke stock price ko uske earnings per share ke relative measure karta hai.

6.question: Compound interest kya hai?
options: Principal aur accumulated interest dono par kamaya gaya interest
Har mahine pay kiya gaya interest
Har saal calculate kiya gaya interest
6.explanation: Compound interest initial principal aur pichle periods se accumulated interest dono par kamaya gaya interest hai.

7.question: Mutual fund kya hai?
options: Kai investors se jama kiya gaya paisa
7.explanation: Ek mutual fund kai investors se paisa jama karke ek diversified portfolio of securities mein invest karta hai.

8.question: Market volatility kya hai?
options: Tezi se aur unpredictable price changes
8.explanation: Market volatility samay ke saath trading prices mein variation ki degree ko refer karti hai.

9.question: Bull market kya hai?
options: Ek market jo gir raha hai
Ek market jo badh raha hai
9.explanation: Ek bull market badhti keematon aur optimistic investor sentiment se pehchana jaata hai.

10.question: Bonds ka primary purpose kya hai?
options: Regular income dena aur capital ko preserve karna
10.explanation: Bonds mukhya roop se interest payments ke zariye regular income dete hain aur capital ko preserve karne mein madad karte hain.

11.question: Asset allocation kya hai?
options: Investments ko alag-alag asset classes mein baantna
11.explanation: Asset allocation stocks, bonds, aur cash jaise alag-alag asset classes ke beech investments ko baantne ka process hai.

12.question: Investments par inflation ka kya asar hota hai?
options: Yeh returns ki purchasing power kam karta hai
Yeh sirf bonds ko prabhavit karta hai
12.explanation: Inflation samay ke saath investment returns ki purchasing power kam karta hai.

13.question: Risk-return tradeoff kya hai?
options: Zyada risk ka matlab hamesha zyada returns hota hai
Aam taur par, zyada potential returns ke saath zyada risk aata hai
Kam risk wale investments hamesha behtar perform karte hain
Risk aur return ka koi sambandh nahi hai
13.explanation: Risk-return tradeoff ka matlab hai ki zyada potential returns wale investments mein aam taur par zyada risk hota hai.
